Class CompanyRepRegistrationController

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseController
controller.CompanyRepRegistrationController
public class CompanyRepRegistrationController extends BaseController
Controller handling registration and management of company representative accounts.

This controller provides functionality for:

  • Registering new company representative accounts (pending approval)
  • Checking email availability
  • Retrieving pending representatives for administrative review
  • Validating registration data and email formats
New company representatives are registered with a pending status and must be approved by an administrator before they can access the system.

  • Method Details

    • registerCompanyRep

      public String registerCompanyRep(String name, String companyName, String department, String position, String email)
      Registers a new company representative account with pending approval status.

      Validates all registration fields and email format before creating the account. The email address is normalized to lowercase and serves as the unique identifier.

      Parameters:
      name - the full name of the company representative
      companyName - the name of the company the representative works for
      department - the department within the company
      position - the job position/title of the representative
      email - the email address (will be used as login identifier)
      Returns:
      the registered representative's email address (identifier)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any required field is null, empty, or if the email format is invalid
      IllegalStateException - if the email address is already registered

    • emailExists

      public boolean emailExists(String email)
      Checks if an email address is already registered in the system.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address to check for existence
      Returns:
      true if the email is already registered, false otherwise

    • getPendingReps

      public List<CompanyRep> getPendingReps()
      Retrieves all company representatives with pending approval status.

      Pending representatives are those who have registered but have not yet been approved or rejected by an administrator.

      Returns:
      a list of company representatives with pending status, or an empty list if no pending representatives exist

    • getRepByEmail

      public CompanyRep getRepByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a company representative by their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the representative to retrieve
      Returns:
      the CompanyRep entity with the specified email
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no company representative is found with the given email address
